<title level="1" pfs="">[Spawn Of Taon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1714)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 33

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Spawn Of Taon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1714)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 29</row>

**Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +20, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +24, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +22

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +5

**Con** +5

**Int** +1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 30 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 175
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
piercing 12, slashing 6

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +24,
**Damage** 2d12+13 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tongue +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** paralysis

**Paralysis**  ([Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) A living creature hit by a mohrg's tongue Strike must succeed at a DC 30 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). The creature can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns. The DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each attempt.

</column>
name: Spawn Of Taon

text: Spawn Of Taon Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 33 Unspecific Lore : DC 31 Specific Lore : DC 28 Spawn Of Taon Source Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star pg. 29 Perception +21; darkvision Languages Common, Necril Skills Acrobatics +20, Athletics +24, Intimidation +22, Society +19, Stealth +22 Str +7 Dex +5 Con +5 Int +1 Wis +4 Cha +5 --- AC 30 Fort +22 Ref +22 Will +19 HP 175 (negative healing) Immunities death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, unconscious Resistances piercing 12, slashing 6 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action claw +24, Damage 2d12+13 slashing plus Grab Melee Single Action tongue +24 (Agile), Damage paralysis Paralysis (Occult, Incapacitation, Necromancy) A living creature hit by a mohrg's tongue Strike must succeed at a DC 30 Fortitude save or become paralyzed. The creature can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns. The DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each attempt.
